metaTags.metaDescription:
Cloudflare was launched at the TechCrunch Disrupt conference on September 27th, 2010. 
That's the date we now observe as our birthday. Every year, on our birthday, we launch new products that further our mission of helping build a better Internet.

relatedBlades.title: Welcome to Birthday Week
relatedBlades.copy: 2021 marks Cloudflare's 11th birthday, and each day this week we will announce new products and host fascinating discussions with guests including product experts, customers, and industry peers.
Join us all week long on Cloudflare TV as we engage business and industry leaders to explore many of the key issues facing the future of the Internet.
relatedBlades.title: Featured Fireside Chats

features.title: Julie Cordua
features.description: CEO of Thorn

features.title: John Scott Railton
features.description: Senior Researcher of The Citizen Lab

features.title: Dacheng Tao
features.description: SVP of JD.com

features.title: Pat Gelsinger

features.title: Rob Chesnut
features.description:
Former General Counsel and Chief Ethics Officer at Airbnb  
Author of the Bestseller "Intentional Integrity: How Smart Companies Can Lead An Ethical Revolution"

features.title: Blog: Welcome to Birthday Week 2021
features.description: It has been our tradition, since our first birthday, to use this week to launch innovative new products that we think of as our gift back to the Internet. Welcome to #BirthdayWeekðŸŽ‚ 2021!

features.title: Cloudflare TV: Welcome to Birthday Week
features.description: Join Matthew Prince (CEO & Co-Founder, Cloudflare), Michelle Zatlyn (Co-Founder, President & Chief Operating Officer, Cloudflare) and Jen Taylor (SVP, Chief Product Officer, Cloudflare) as they kick off Cloudflare's 11th Birthday with this fireside chat on Cloudflare TV.

features.title: Blog: The secret to Cloudflare's pace of Innovation
features.description: How do we get so much stuff out so quickly? That we are able to innovate â€” and innovate so quickly â€” is no happy accident. In fact, this capability has been very deliberately built into the DNA of Cloudflare. I want to touch on three of the reasons most unique to us: one relates to our people, one relates to our technology, and one relates to our customers.

features.title: Press Release: Cloudflare Takes On Email Security
features.description: Cloudflare announced its entry into email security with new offerings to help solve email challenges in an easy-to-use way that gives customers more control. Now, users will be able to create custom email addresses, manage incoming email routing, and prevent email spoofing and phishing on outgoing emailsâ€”all for free.

features.title: Blog: Easily creating and routing email addresses with Cloudflare Email Routing
features.description: You can now easily and quickly create email addresses for domain, and forward to them all to your preferred inbox, like Gmail or Outlook. Cloudflare Email Forwarding is completely free, and always respects your privacy by not storing or looking into your emails.

features.title: Blog: Tackling Email Spoofing and Phishing
features.description: Today we're announcing a new tool to tackle email spoofing and phishing. We'll warn users about insecure configurations and provide an easy-to-use wizard to create required DNS records.

features.title: Cloudflare TV: John Scott Railton & Joe Sullivan Fireside Chat
features.description: In this Cloudflare TV segment, we will have a fireside chat between Joe Sullivan (SVP, Chief Security Officer of Cloudflare) and John Scott Railton (Senior Researcher at The Citizen Lab).

features.title: Cloudflare TV: Creating and routing email addresses with Cloudflare Email Routing
features.description: We are very excited to announce Cloudflare Email Routing. Everyone should have multiple email addresses, for the online banking login to stay separate from mailing lists and spam, but it's been quite cumbersome for some to do. Cloudflare Email Routing helps create free email addresses for your domain, and redirect them all to the mailbox you already use - like Gmail or Outlook.

features.title: Cloudflare TV: Tackling Email Spoofing and Phishing
features.description: Mitigate email spoofing and phishing risks, and improve email deliverability with Cloudflare's  new Email Security DNS Wizard. Protect users by creating DNS records that prevent others from sending malicious emails on behalf of your domain. Join us as we discuss how to leverage the latest Cloudflare DNS feature enhancement to protect your domains.

features.title: Cloudflare TV: Introducing Cloudflare R2 Storage
features.description: Join the Cloudflare developer product team to discuss today's announcement: R2 Object Storage. The team will review how to join the early access program, and everything else you need to get started.

features.title: Blog: Announcing Cloudflare R2 Storage: Rapid and Reliable Object Storage, minus the egress fees
features.description: Introducing Cloudflare's S3-compatible Object Storage service, with zero egress bandwidth charges and automatic migration from S3-compatible services.

features.title: Blog: A Better Internet with UN Global Compact
features.description: Every year during Birthday Week, we talk about what we mean by our mission to help build a better Internet. We release new protocols and products that help the global Internet community and give things like unmitigated DDoS Protection away for free. We also think about our role as an active participant in the global community of individuals, companies and governments that make the Internet what it is.

features.title: Blog: Registrar for Everyone
features.description: We're excited to announce that all customers now have the ability to register new domains.

features.title: Cloudflare TV: Cloudflare Registrar for Everyone
features.description: Registrar for Everyone - new domain registrations, support for additional TLDs, and what's coming next for Registrar.

features.title: Cloudflare TV: Dacheng Tao & Jonathon Dixon Fireside Chat
features.description: During this session, Jonathon Dixon (Head of Asia Pacific Sales of Cloudflare) will host our guest Dacheng Tao (SVP of JD.com) to discuss the evolution of JD Cloud and the techniques in the future.

features.title: Press Release: Cloudflare Announces R2 Storage; Rapid and Reliable S3-Compatible Object Storage Designed for the Edge
features.description: Cloudflare announced Cloudflare R2 Storage, a better way for developers to store everything they need with automatic migration of data from S3-compatible services to make switching easy. Cloudflare R2 Storage, designed for the edge, will offer the ability to store large amounts of data, expanding what's possible with Cloudflare while slashing the egress bandwidth fees associated with cloud provider storage to zero.

features.title: Blog: Cloudflare for Offices
features.description: We are extending Cloudflare's network directly into over 1,000 of the most populated office buildings.

imageAssetFile.altText: Birthday Week 2021 - CF for Offices Blog Header
imageAssetFile.title: Birthday Week 2021 - CF for Offices Blog Header

features.title: Blog: Dark Mode for the Cloudflare Dashboard
features.description: Dark mode is now available for the Cloudflare Dashboard in beta! From your user profile, you can configure the Cloudflare Dashboard in light mode, dark mode, or match it to your system settings.

features.title: Press Release: Cloudflare Extends Zero Trust Security to Businesses' Doorsteps
features.description: Cloudflare announced it will extend its network to iconic properties like Salesforce Tower in San Francisco, Willis Tower Chicago, John Hancock Tower in Boston, and 30 Hudson Yards, 4 Times Square & 520 Madison in New York, as well as the planned further expansion into thousands of other office buildings and multi-dwelling units globally.

features.title: Cloudflare TV: A Better Internet with the UN Global Compact
features.description: Join Cloudflare's Policy Team as they discuss the UN Global Compact and the origins of corporate sustainability, as well as Cloudflare's first public sustainability report.

features.title: Cloudflare TV: Pat Gelsinger & Matthew Prince Fireside Chat
features.description: In this Cloudflare TV segment, we will have a fireside chat between Matthew Prince (CEO & Co-Founder of Cloudflare) and Pat Gelsinger (CEO of Intel).

features.title: Blog: Real-Time Communications at Scale
features.description: We're making it easier to build and scale real-time communications applications around open technologies, starting with WebRTC Components.

imageAssetFile.altText: Birthday Week 2021 - Real Time Communications Header
imageAssetFile.title: Birthday Week 2021 - Real Time Communications Header

features.title: Blog: Announcing Cloudflare TV as a Service
features.description: Today we're excited to announce that we're making the technology we used to build Cloudflare TV available to any other business that wants to run their own 24x7 streaming network.

features.title: Blog: Stream Live: End-to-end Serverless Live Streaming You Can Now Go Live with Cloudflare Stream
features.description: You can now use Cloudflare to do serverless end-to-end live-streaming. Stream Live offers video ingestion, encoding, recording and a player in a single product.

features.title: Cloudflare TV: Live streaming with Cloudflare Stream
features.description: Cloudflare Stream now supports end-to-end live streaming. Learn how you can use Stream to build live functionality into your apps

features.title: Cloudflare TV: Real Time Communications Platform & CFTV as a Service
features.description:
Join Jason, Fallon, Appoorva and Matt to learn how Cloudflare's new Real Time Communication Platform will support the next generation of real-time audio and video applications â€” including Cloudflare TV 2.0!

You'll also learn about the just-announced CFTV as a Service, which will enable other businesses to launch their own 24x7 TV channels powered by Cloudflare's network.

imageAssetFile.altText: Real Time Communications Platform and CFTV as a Service Thumbnail
imageAssetFile.title: Real Time Communications Platform and CFTV as a Service Thumbnail

features.title: Cloudflare TV: Rob Chesnut & Joe Sullivan Fireside Chat
features.description: In this Cloudflare TV segment, we will have a fireside chat between Joe Sullivan (SVP, Chief Security Officer of Cloudflare) and Rob Chesnut (Former General Counsel and Chief Ethics Officer at Airbnb Author of the Bestseller "Intentional Integrity: How Smart Companies Can Lead An Ethical Revolution).

features.title: Blog: Announcing The Cloudflare Distributed Web Gateways Private Beta: Unlocking the Web3 Metaverse and Decentralized Finance for Everyone
features.description: Cloudflare announces the Private Beta of their Web3 gateways for Ethereum and IPFS. Unlocking the Metaverse, Web3, and Decentralized Finance for every developer.

features.title: Blog: Get started Building Web3 Apps with Cloudflare
features.description: Learn how to build Web3 applications with Cloudflare's new open-source template.

features.title: Blog: How Cloudflare protects its IPFS nodes
features.description: The Cloudflare IPFS module protects users from threats like phishing and ransomware. Its code is available on github.com/cloudflare/go-ipfs.

features.title: Blog: Web3 - A vision for a distributed and private Web
features.description: In this blog we start to explain Web3 in the context of the web's evolution, and how Cloudflare might help to support it.

features.title: Cloudflare TV: Birthday Week 2021 Recap
features.description: Join Vivek Ganti (Sr. Product Marketing Manager, Cloudflare), Greg McKeon (Product Manager, Cloudflare), JoÃ£o Sousa Botto (Product Manager, Cloudflare) as they discuss all of the exciting announcements from this past week in honor of Cloudflare's 11th Birthday!

features.title: Cloudflare TV: Get started building Web3 apps with Cloudflare
features.description: Learn about how to build on the distributed web with Web3 and Cloudflare. Kristian Freeman and Jon Kuperman from the Developer Advocacy team will walk through the new open-source Web3 application from Cloudflare, and how to get started deploying your own Non-Fungible Token (NFT) project to the Ethereum blockchain.

features.title: Cloudflare TV: Julie Cordua & Joe Sullivan Fireside Chat
features.description: In this Cloudflare TV segment, we will have a fireside chat between Joe Sullivan (SVP, Chief Security Officer of Cloudflare) and Julie Cordua (CEO of Thorn).

features.title: Cloudflare TV: The Future of Web3
features.description: Join Wesley Evans (Product Manager, Cloudflare), Nick Sullivan (Head of Research, Cloudflare) as they discuss the maturing Web3 market and the future of the distributed web with guests Dete Shirley (Chief Technology Officer, Dapper Labs) and Dietrich Ayala (IPFS Ecosystem Lead, Protocol Labs).

features.title: Cloudflare TV: Web3 for Developers Roundtable
features.description: Kristian Freeman and Jon Kuperman from Cloudflare's Developer Advocacy Team, will be joined by Nader Dabit, Developer Relations Engineer at Edge & Node, and the author of The Complete Guide to Full Stack Ethereum Development, to chat about the exciting opportunities in the Web3 space for developers. Don't miss it!

features.title: Cloudflare TV: What is Web3?
features.description: Tune in to this live discussion on Web3 in the context of the web's evolution, and how Cloudflare might help to support it. We provide a nuanced vision for Web3, a more decentralized and private web.

features.title: Blog: Two Weeks Later: Finding and Eliminating Long Tail Latencies
features.description: A little over two weeks ago, we shared extensive benchmarking results of edge networks around the world, and made a commitment that we would improve in 10% of networks where we were not #1.

imageAssetFile.altText: Birthday Week - Speed week fast follow header
imageAssetFile.title: Birthday Week - Speed week fast follow header

features.description:
__Cloudflare turns 10!__  
Cron Triggers  
Durable Objects  
Web Analytics  
Cloudflare Radar  
API Shield   
Automatic Platform Optimizations

WARP Plus  
Browser Insights  
Bot Defend Mode  
Workers Sites  
HTTP3

Registrar  
Bandwidth Alliance  
QUIC support  
Workers KV  
ESNI

Unmetered DDoS mitigation  
Cloudflare Stream  
Geo Key Manager  
Workers
Rebranding effort and CloudFlare becomes Cloudflare, along with a new logo and website. Also introduced early access to managed dedicated SSL certificates, global load balancing and rate limiting.
Expansion to China and announcement of our partnership with Baidu to bring 17 new data centers online in mainland China.
Launch of Universal SSL for all Cloudflare customers ensuring that every website supported on our network is secure.
Cloudflare launches a free automatic IPv6 Gateway for all users to ease their transition to IPv6.
Cloudflare officially launched in 2010 at TechCrunch Disrupt with 1,000 websites subscribed during the initial beta.
